projectPurpose: To provide a programming language and environment that facilitates data transformation, data science, and data-driven applications through a hybrid visual and textual functional programming approach.
mainFeatures: Hybrid visual and textual programming interface
Designed for data transformation and analysis
Seamless switching between visual and textual editing

alternatives.name: KNIME Analytics Platform
mainFeatures: Large collection of nodes for data processing, ML, etc.

marketPositioning: Enso occupies a unique position by combining a hybrid visual/textual interface with a functional programming core, specifically targeting data-driven tasks. It differentiates itself from purely textual functional languages by offering visual accessibility and from traditional visual data workflow tools by providing a more general-purpose, deeply integrated programming experience with the benefits of a functional paradigm. It aims to bridge the gap for users who require both the power of code and the intuitiveness of visual design for data transformation and analysis.
